item.title: Add Monitor Graphs to Openwrt
item.description: According to the docs here https://openwrt.org/docs/guide-user/luci/luci_app_statistics, OpenWrt supports us using the Collectd to collect metrics and the Rrdtool draw the graph later. Install opkg update opkg install luci-app-statistics We can run the command opkg list | grep collectd-mod to see what mertics we can collect. I have installed these modules
